ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller

Class AuthenticationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller.AuthenticationController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200")
public class AuthenticationController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest Controller for handling requests involving authentication and signing in.
    Author:
    Karol Talbot

    • Method Detail

      • getToken

        @PostMapping(value="/tokensignin")
public UserAccount getToken(@RequestBody
                                                                java.lang.String idtoken)
                                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Gets the UserAccount associated with the Google user that owns the token.
        Parameters:
        idtoken - String containing encrypted Google user information
        Returns:
        UserAccount associated with the id token
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - When a problem occurs with the GooglePublicKeysManager
        java.io.IOException - When bad stuff happens

      • getNavBarOptions

        @GetMapping(value="/build_nav_bar")
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> getNavBarOptions(@RequestHeader
                                                                                                               java.lang.String signIn,
                                                                                                               @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                               UserAuthManager authMan)
                                                                                                        throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                                                                                               java.io.IOException
        Handles requests to generate the top nav bar for the client hiding options that would not be able to be processed by the server.
        Parameters:
        signIn - The user's identification token
        authMan - The user's UserAuthorizationManager
        Returns:
        Map containing which nav options to show
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - When a problem occurs with the GooglePublicKeysManager
        java.io.IOException - When bad stuff happens

      • handleExceptions

        @ExceptionHandler(value={java.io.IOException.class,java.security.GeneralSecurityException.class})
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> handleExceptions(java.lang.Exception e)
        Informs the client that an exception has occurred. In order to keep the server inner workings private a generic 400 bad request is used.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception that had occurred
        Returns:
        A 400 Bad Request Response
